# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. I understand its immense value to you, as it's worth $800,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer not only represents a substantial saving compared to the market value but also secures your competitive edge in the industry. I look forward to discussing the details further and am here to answer any questions you might have. Let's make this valuable asset work for you now! Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
